Ramadan\' 20 Sehri:00:00am Iftar:00:00pm Already Registered Click Here..! Not Registered Yet Click Here.!" Forgot Password? Ramadan \'20 app Build Version: 1.0 The developer of this app is Amina Saeed Zargar, while Amina has Pursued Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from SSM College of Engineering and Technology. Connect With Us: we are on LinkedIn as: @aminasaeed
--> Settings
Suhoor dua وَبِصَوْمِ غَدٍ نَّوَيْتَ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ Wa bi-sawmi ghadin nawaytu min shahri ramadan I intend to keep the fast for tomorrow in the month of Ramadan.
Iftar dua \u200F اِنِّى لَكَ صُمْتُ وَبِكَ امنْتُ وَ عَلى رِزْقِكَ اَفْطَرْتُ Allahumma Inni laka sumtu wa bika amantu [wa alayka tawakkalto] wa ‘ala rizqika aftartu O Allah! I fasted for You and I believe in You and I break my fast with Your sustenance
